name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With their cat-like box body, classic buttons, and foundry arms and legs, Circuit is a unique and stylish addition to the club. Although their screen is broken, they make up for it with their superior intelligence and technical skills. Circuit's helmet addon adds an extra layer of protection and enhances their abilities. They are always ready to analyze and process information, making them an invaluable asset to the club.
